title: Grandma

fields.name: Life Alert!:
fields.value: Each Night, you will receive a list of targets, the size of which is proportional to your score. You may choose one to protect, granting them an additional 0.3x Defense Power for the Night. Additionally, if they are attacked, you will receive a list of their visitors for the Night.

fields.name: Grandma's Secret Recipe (Locked, x2):
fields.value: This ability is unlocked if you place in the Top 3. Target a player and grant them an additional 1.0x Defense Power for the Night. If they are attacked, you will learn the identities of everyone who attacked them.
